alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:14PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE... EASTERN CLINTON...SOUTHERN PICKAWAY...NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EST... At 213 PM EST, a snow shower was located 7 miles south of New Holland, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Washington Court House, Greenfield, Leesburg, Kingston, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, Bainbridge, New Holland, North Folk Village, Logan Elm Village, Staunton, Good Hope, Frankfort, Londonderry, Clarksburg, South Salem, East Monroe, Mooresville, and Austin. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
